‘SUBJECT: SIS Merchandising Tables

IMPORTANT REQUEST

‘As previously communicated, changes have been made in the Merchandising Tables to capture the Pack
‘and Carton account conditions important to measuring the success of our 1996 Retail Partners Marketing
Plan implementation.

‘Your immediate assistance is requested to accurately update these indicators by February 16, 1996.

In order to simply, insure consistency, and request only the most ertical information the following,
measures have been taken:

‘© Reduction of Indicators
Effective January 29, 1996 the Merchandising Tables will be mocified and the process willbe started
to clean out all od Table entries. The previous set of indicators willbe removed as you receive a full
download on your laptop, Poget or Norand as appropriate.

The current merchandising entries ae listed below. These "entries will reside under the sub-
heading 'RUR Pack’ for ease of entering

‘The indicators are to be used to capture conditions in both Pack and Carton Outlets, Please note
‘some indicators are directed toward Pack Outlets while others apply to both Carton and Pack

summary: The current merchandising entries ae listed below. These "entries will reside under the sub-heading 'RUR Pack’ for ease of entering. The indicators are to be used to capture conditions in both Pack and Carton Outlets, Please note that some indicators. are directed toward Pack outlets while others apply to both Cartons and Pack.
